name: Sweet Potato Chips in the Air Fryer
author: Bibi
summary: Sweet potato chips are prepared in no time in the air fryer. They turn out wonderfully crispy and delicious. Serve straight out of the air fryer with your favorite dip or sandwich.
ingredients: 1 medium sweet potato, peeled and sliced crossways into 1/8-inch slices
½ teaspoon Creole seasoning, or to taste
directions: Preheat air fryer to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Place sweet potato slices in a large bowl
Stir in avocado oil, evenly coating each piece
Add Creole seasoning, stirring to combine
Place slices in a thin layer on the bottom of the air fryer basket
Cook in the preheated air fryer for 7 minutes
Shake slices and turn to allow for even cooking
Continue cooking until desired crispness is achieved, about 6 more minutes
Transfer potato slices to a rack and allow to cool
